mapper.select: select groupid from study_group where memberid = #{memberid}

SELECT P.pkgId, p.pkgName, m.memberID, d.subsDate, p.finalPrice, p.difficulty, p.PERSONNEL, p.pkgContent, NVL2(g.groupID, g.groupID, 'NOT GROUP') AS groupID FROM package p JOIN PKGSUBSDETAIL D ON P.pkgId = D.pkgId JOIN member m ON D.memberID = m.memberID LEFT JOIN study_group g ON D.pkgId = g.pkgId WHERE p.elimination = 'N' AND m.mType = 'T' AND m.memberID = 'memberID22'
